meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of miniaturism.
meanings.sent1: The tiny dollhouse furniture had a miniaturistic charm.
meanings.sent2: The artist's miniaturistic paintings were displayed in a special exhibit.
meanings.sent3: The miniaturistic garden gnome seemed to be guarding the flower bed.
meanings.sent4: Her miniaturistic attention to detail in the model ship was truly impressive.
meanings.sent5: The miniaturistic world inside the snow globe was enchanting to behold.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the art of making small-scale models or replicas.
meanings.sent1: The miniaturistic train set was meticulously crafted by hand.
meanings.sent2: She specialized in creating miniaturistic versions of famous landmarks.
meanings.sent3: The miniaturistic replica of the Eiffel Tower fit in the palm of his hand.
meanings.sent4: The miniaturistic model of the car was so realistic, it could easily be mistaken for the real thing.
meanings.sent5: The miniaturistic diorama captured a moment frozen in time.

meanings.definition: Exhibiting a tendency towards creating small or diminutive objects.
meanings.sent1: Her miniaturistic sculptures were delicate and intricate.
meanings.sent2: The artist's miniaturistic style was evident in all her works.
meanings.sent3: The miniaturistic figurines on the shelf seemed to come to life at night.
meanings.sent4: His miniaturistic collection of vintage toys was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The miniaturistic details in the model village were astonishingly realistic.
